front.title: Identity-Based Signatures for MANET Routing Protocols

abstract.t: This document extends [RFC7182], which specifies a framework for, and specific examples of, integrity check values (ICVs) for packets and messages using the generalized packet/message format specified in [RFC5444]. It does so by defining an additional cryptographic function that allows the creation of an ICV that is an identity-based signature, defined according to the ECCSI (Elliptic Curve-Based Certificateless Signatures for Identity-Based Encryption) algorithm specified in [RFC6507].
